## store add

Add uploads files to server

### Synopsis


examples of command. For example:
	
// upload two files to server
store add -f file1.txt -f file2.txt


```
store add [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -f, --file stringArray   Files to be uploaded on server
  -h, --help               help for add
```
